rules.description: Caps Lock → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧⌘) (Caps Lock if alone)

manipulators.description: Swap Yabai windows on the X asis
Swap Yabai windows on the Y asis
Move back once space in mission control
Move to the next space in mission control
Move to the left window in relation to current focused window
Move to the bottom window in relation to current focused window
Move to the top window in relation to current focused window
Move to the right window in relation to current focused window

rules.description: Use Delete as Move to Trash
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
